#summary simple install instructions

== Summary ==
 * Download
 * Install
 * Post install setup

=== Download ===
 * download from [http://eclipse.org/aspectj/downloads.php Aspectj Downloads] page

=== Install ===
{{{
java -jar aspectj-1.6.11.jar
}}}
=== Post install setup ===
 * modify PATH by editing .bash_profile
{{{
export PATH="${PATH}:/Users/jkroub/aspectj1.6/bin"
}}}
 * when aspectJ required simply include the jar (aspectj-1.6.11.jar) on the classpath
